titleStmt.title: Three sermons preached in Lent and summer assizes last at Lancaster, and on one of the Lords days in the late Guild of Preston : wherein the nature of subjection to the civil magistrate is explained, the duty proved, and the clergy justified in pressing the same upon their fellow-subjects / by Thomas Gipps.
titleStmt.author: Gipps, Thomas, d. 1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.H. for Walter Kettilby,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
